tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was in search of a Prosthodontist since last 6 months for getting veneers done on the front tooth.  Since it was a kind of smile correction, I was not ready to settle for a doctor until I found it convincing myself which was of utmost importance. Though I visited multiple dental clinics none of them were satisfactory. I was referred to Dr. Shambhu by a friend. He is commendable at his work moreover he had a convincing approach about the procedure. He understood my requirement and suggested the treatment. The whole procedure went smoothly without any fear, pain or discomfort. I am glad I made the right choice of the doctor and would highly recommend. Thank You Sir!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** ** *** *** ***** ** ********* *** ****** ********* Both Dr Shambu and Dr Aarti are highly qualified and are extremely skilled and talented in all kinds of dental treatments. I consulted them for multiple root canals, Extractions & Implants. They guided me with me all the options and have executed the treatment really well. Both doctors have demonstrated amazing professionalism and are very approachable which i have not experienced anywhere else.¬† And they even have xray machines etc. which makes this a one stop clinic for all kinds of dental problems. I am delighted with the way I was treated through out the time. Now my whole family is getting treatment from them and all of us have the same experience.
reply_text: Feels happy to serve you and your family. Thank You for trusting us and we promise to continue our service in future
